title: Update admin whitelist with correct Principal ID

requirements.text: Replace the existing whitelisted Principal ID 'o6emp-est7q-rcxzc-yzqpr-bfbh5-2wpes-yh7ir-zzpdu-w7brm-eo53w-xqe' with the correct Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-sqe' in the backend admin whitelist
acceptanceCriteria: The Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-sqe' is added to the admin whitelist in backend/main.mo
The old Principal ID 'o6emp-est7q-rcxzc-yzqpr-bfbh5-2wpes-yh7ir-zzpdu-w7brm-eo53w-xqe' is removed from the whitelist
User can successfully access the admin panel at /admin without seeing 'Access Denied' when authenticated with the correct Principal ID

constraints: Preserve all existing admin panel functionality and access control logic
Maintain the MixinAuthorization and AccessControl module patterns used in the current implementation
